name: Snack Slugger
description:
Serve concessions to hungry fans at the old ballgame!

CONTROLS:
C: Start
Arrow Keys: Move, cycle through food options
C: Open food selection popup
X: Serve Food

When an audience member asks for food, walk up to their row on  the side of the stairs they're on, press C to open food selection, then use left and right arrows to cycle through until you find the thing they're requesting. Then press C to slug your selection across to them!

CREDITS:
Timconceivable: Programming, animation
